text: Overseas threats - Iran to Yemen. That's topic #1 on Kudlow Report tonight. Live viewer calls as well. 800-800-CNBC. Lines open @ 7pm ET
We're fielding live viewer calls again on tonight's Kudlow Report. Phone lines will open up at 7pm ET. The # is 800-800-CNBC.
Get your questions ready...we're taking live calls on tonight's Kudlow Report. Number is 800-800-CNBC. Phone lines open at 6pm ET.

Is Obama going supply-side?

The dollar's decline is the biggest storm cloud on the horizon. We can't devalue our way to prosperity.
Big exclusive interview w/ World Bank President Robert Zoellick tonight. We'll talk dollar, Fed vs Treasury etc. CNBC Kudlow Report 7pm ET.
FDIC chairman Sheila Bair coming on Kudlow Report tonight for 1-on-1 interview. Bad loans piling up, 100s of banks on sicklist. 7pm on CNBC.
Here's the $$$ question: Is Bernanke going to be “Helicopter Ben” or is he going to be “King Dollar” Ben? This is the paramount issue.
Re: Congress hearings on Merrill-BofA/Paulson/Bernanke/etc, even if they found a needle in haystack, it'd be covered in rust. Give it up.

Something investors don’t seem to get: The Fed’s stopped printing $. Since Dec, no new $. It's causing commodity & stock market deflation.

BigGov should keep its paws off oil futures mkt. If govt doesnt know where economy & oil demand is headed, how can oil prices? Let mkt work.

Palin's right to get out of AK's ankle biting politics. Now she can do radio, TV, speeches, books. She'll reenergize conservatism & GOP.

Index of Leading Indicators is turning up fast; credit spreads are back down to normal. Plenty of $$ in system. Econ recovery is on the way
Jack Welch on Obama reg reform, CNBC this am: "Let's slow down..we're touching every corner of this economy..healthcare, cap&trade" Amen.
Re: Obama reg reform: Giving the Fed supreme power is putting fox in charge of henhouse. Fed created mess. Now we trust them to get us out?
Is the Fed gonna monetize the debt? Thats the trillion $ question. If they do, they destroy King Dollar. If they dont, they resurrect it
Obama moving right? Read Summers speech last Fri. No back-door socialism. Geithner sounding same. Worried about polls? Any progress is good.
Novel idea...Instead of buying GM/Chrysler, Treasury ought to purchase US dollars. Who wants to own auto cos? Restore King Dollar.
Time to pay down TARP. Roll back socialism. Stop the Treasury TARP slush fund. Give the $$$ back to U.S. taxpayers.
AAA reports retail gas at $2.61 today. Last fall it was $1.60. Drill, drill, drill. Democratic Senator Byron Dorgan wants to drill. Hooray.
Obama is selling PAYGO today. Caveat emptor. It’s a tax hike trap. Just say no.

mozilo's a personal friend. so tough for me to say this,but SEC needs to

Is it just me or does President Obama have more "czars" than the Romanovs?
We've got to stop oil from going to $85 or $100 or more. It's time to Drill Drill Drill. We'll discuss tonight on Kudlow Report. CNBC 7pm

Bernanke told U.S. not to worry.  Deficits, dollar, inflation, recession, recovery. He's gonna fix it.  Do we actually believe this guy?
